content.question: Which of the following is a consequence of the bicameral legislature in both Mexico and the United Kingdom?

choices.label: Subnational governments are protected because the upper chamber must approve federal intervention in state matters.
Civilian control of the military is assured because the upper chamber must approve troop deployment.
There is a check on the executive because there is fusion of power between the two chambers.
Policy making is slowed because both chambers participate in the policy-making process.

content.answer: Policy making is slowed because both chambers participate in the policy-making process.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with similar political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
